Text.val: checks if there's open/closed LOCs/DIs and returns that information

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) as N from :6/lchd a inner join :6/cflc b on b.CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED=a.LCHD_ADMNO and b.CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED=a.LCHD_CLNTNO where b.CFLC_ADMNO=:1 and b.CFLC_CLNTNO=:2 and b.CFLC_USRID=':3' and a.LCHD_DATETERMINATION IS :5 NULL :4

select count(*) as N from :6/dchd a inner join :6/cflc b on b.CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED=a.DCHD_ADMNO and b.CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED=a.DCHD_CLNTNO where b.CFLC_ADMNO=:1 and b.CFLC_CLNTNO=:2 and b.CFLC_USRID=':3' and a.DCHD_DATETERMINATION IS :5 NULL :4
